Package view

Class PharmacistView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.PharmacistView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplayMenu
    public class PharmacistView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplayMenu
    The PharmacistView class provides an interface for pharmacists to interact with the Hospital Management System (HMS) This class allows pharmacists to view appointment outcomes, Update prescription statuses, Manage inventory, Submit replenishment requests for medicine, Change their password

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PharmacistView​(Pharmacist pharmacist, MedicineManager medicineManager, ReplenishmentManager replenishmentManager, AppointmentManager appointmentManager, java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Constructs a PharmacistView with the required dependencies.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu for the pharmacist and handles user interactions.
      void submitReplenishmentRequestView()
      Allows the pharmacist to submit a replenishment request for a specific medicine.
      void updatePrescriptionStatus()
      Allows the pharmacist to update the prescription status for a completed appointment.
      void viewAppointmentOutcome()
      Displays the outcomes of all appointments handled by the hospital.
      void viewInventoryView()
      Displays the entire medicine inventory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PharmacistView

        public PharmacistView​(Pharmacist pharmacist,
                      MedicineManager medicineManager,
                      ReplenishmentManager replenishmentManager,
                      AppointmentManager appointmentManager,
                      java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Constructs a PharmacistView with the required dependencies.
        Parameters:
        pharmacist - The pharmacist object representing the current pharmacist.
        medicineManager - The manager to handle medicine-related operations.
        replenishmentManager - The manager to handle replenishment requests.
        appointmentManager - The manager to handle appointment-related operations.
        scanner - The Scanner object for reading user input.

    • Method Detail

      • displayMenu

        public void displayMenu()
        Displays the main menu for the pharmacist and handles user interactions.
        Specified by:
        displayMenu in interface IDisplayMenu

      • viewInventoryView

        public void viewInventoryView()
        Displays the entire medicine inventory.

      • submitReplenishmentRequestView

        public void submitReplenishmentRequestView()
        Allows the pharmacist to submit a replenishment request for a specific medicine.

      • updatePrescriptionStatus

        public void updatePrescriptionStatus()
        Allows the pharmacist to update the prescription status for a completed appointment. If the medicine is sufficient, it dispenses the prescription; otherwise, notifies the user.

      • viewAppointmentOutcome

        public void viewAppointmentOutcome()
        Displays the outcomes of all appointments handled by the hospital.
